item.description:
Protest to be on Sunday 4/11, 2pm at the Blueline Airport stop
(where you catch the shuttle buses), participants are asked to
either dress up as a lab rat, or to dress down to swimwear,
boxers and ties, etc..., depending on the numbers that attend we will disseminate fliers and graphix from the BlueLine stop to the Airport(Terminal A) via the Airport shuttles, we are hoping for a visual and educational demonstration against this unlawful and dangerous practice.
Some of the topics for fliers

1.Edward Freni, director of aviation at Logan,"We want to be
the laboratory where these things are tested."??
2. The so called underwear bomber, another false flag, later
admitted to by the FBI
3. The dangers of radiation and the outright breaking of the
fourth amendment
4. Logan was the first to implement in the country
5. We are not criminals!!!!
6. Those that are willing to sacrifice essential liberty for the sake of tempory security, deserve neither, Ben Franklin.
Please help make this a successful event as we strive to protect OUR health and liberty.

group.name: We Are Change Boston / Boston 9/11 Truth

item.name: Logan Body Scanner Protest
